snippet: An assailant “rushed at the throat of one of the soldiers,” injuring one in the face and cutting the arm of another, the mayor of Nice said.
abstract: French police arrest man identified as Moussa Coulibaly, charging him with attacking and wounding three soldiers guarding Jewish community center in Nice.

byline.original: By MAÏA de la BAUME and DAN BILEFSKY
byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: An assailant “rushed at the throat of one of the soldiers,” injuring one in the face and cutting the arm of another, the mayor of Nice said.

headline.main: French Soldiers Guarding Jewish Site Are Attacked
headline.print_headline: French Soldiers Guarding Jewish Site Are Attacked
